articles.title: 'They are not subject to the Geneva Conventions' - Russia will prosecute captured Americans - News24
articles.description: Two Americans captured in Ukraine while fighting with Kyiv's military were "endangering" Russian soldiers and should be "held accountable for those crimes", Kremlin spokesperson Dmitry Peskov has said.
articles.content:
• Russia will prosecute Alexander Drueke and Andy Huynh for crimes in Ukraine.
  • They were captured fighting alongside Ukraine forces.
